title: Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono | Biography & Facts | Britannica

quotes: powerful earthquakes in 2009 and another major tsunami and the eruption of Mount Merapi in 2010—each of which killed hundreds of people.
powerful earthquakes in 2009 and another major tsunami and the eruption of Mount Merapi in 2010—each of which killed hundreds of people.
Indonesia nonetheless was generally prosperous and peaceful for most of the term, though by 2013 economic growth had slowed and inflation was rising.
the party did badly in the 2014 legislative elections. Yudhoyono was unable to run again for president, because of term limits, and he left office in October 2014, succeeded by Joko Widodo (Jokowi).
Yudhoyono was unable to run again for president, because of term limits, and he left office in October 2014, succeeded by Joko Widodo (Jokowi).
In 2015 he became leader of the PD, and he served until 2020, when his son Agus Harimurti Yudhoyono assumed the post.
In 2015 he became leader of the PD, and he served until 2020, when his son Agus Harimurti Yudhoyono assumed the post.
